p: Ribeirão Preto is a municipality in São Paulo state, Brazil, with a south latitude of 21°10′ and a longitude of 47°50′ west. It occupies an area of about 651 km 2, with 127 km 2 being in urban perimeter [ 12, 13]. The Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (or IBGE) estimated its population as 674 405 inhabitants [ 14] and its economy is based on agribusiness, mainly the sugar-alcohol sector and citriculture.
